explanation: Column 'item_code' maps directly to 'item_code' field in Inventory Data schema.
Column 'item_name' maps directly to 'item_name' field in Inventory Data schema.
Column 'stock_qty' maps to 'stock_quantity' field in Inventory Data schema based on mapping history.
Column 'reorder_level' maps directly to 'reorder_level' field in Inventory Data schema.
